articles.title: Kim Jong Un Watches Sports Matches of Service Personnel of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Watches Sports Matches of Service Personnel of KPA
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- There took place sports matches between service personnel of the Command of the Navy and Command of the Air and Anti-Air Force of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 Supreme Commander of the KPA Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, watched the matches together with Ri Sol Ju. 
					
					 They were divided into two teams, Kalmaegi and Jebi.
					
					 They competed in basketball and tug of war.
					
					 The Jebi team won the matches.
					
					 Prize was awarded to the winner.
					
					 Noting that the sports matches between the two teams were played at a high level on the occasion of the significant Day of the Shining Star, Kim Jong Un expressed expectation and belief that the KPA would take the lead in raising a strong wind of sports throughout the country in the future, too.
					
					 Among the spectators were Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, So Hong Chan, Kim Myong Sik, Ri Pyong Chol and other commanding officers and service personnel of the KPA.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Watches Performance Given by State Merited Chorus
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Watches Performance Given by State Merited Chorus
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the State Merited Chorus at the People's Theater in celebration of the 72nd birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, appreciated the performance together with Ri Sol Ju.
					
					 He warmly congratulated the audience on the significant Day of the Shining Star.
					
					 The performance was divided into two parts.
					
					 Put on the stage were male choruses "The General Will Live Forever as the Sun", "General on a Galloping White Horse" and "Soldiers March", instrumental trio "It Is Pride of Our Party", orchestral music "Attraction and Reverence" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers highly praised Kim Jong Il for performing undying feats with patriotic devotion and efforts all his life.
					
					 Also staged were such foreign songs as male chorus "In the Forest Near the Front" and orchestral music "A Collection of World Famous Music."
					
					 He congratulated the artistes on their successful performance.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the creators and artistes of the chorus would more powerfully encourage the service personnel and people in their grandiose drive for ushering in a period of prosperity of Songun Korea.
					
					 Among the audience were Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Pyon In Son, So Hong Chan and other commanding officers of the KPA and its service personnel.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Reconstruction of Sports Village
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Reconstruction of Sports Village
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the projects for remodeling the sports village in Chongchun Street.
					 Soldier-builders and people have modernized the gymnasiums in the sports village by their concerted efforts. 
					
					 The premier went round the rooms dedicated to their history, training halls, lounges for players and rooms for press conference, etc. of the basketball, volleyball and swimming gymnasiums to learn about the overall progress made in the projects. 
					
					 Then he chaired a consultative meeting of officials concerned on the spot.
					
					 Noting sports play a big role in instilling strong national pride and honor into the people, he underlined the need to successfully operate the gymnasiums as required by the desire to build a sports power.
					
					 The premier also learnt about the project for remodeling May Day Stadium and discussed and took measures for settling the issues arising in the project.
					
					 Earlier, he made a field survey of the production at the Anju Area Coal Mining Complex.

articles.title: DPRK Education Commission Delegation Back Home
articles.content: Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the DPRK Education Commission headed by its Chairman Kim Sung Du returned home on Tuesday after taking part in the 9th International Conference on Higher Education held in Cuba.

articles.title: Delegation of Overseas Koreans Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of Overseas Koreans Leaves
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the International United Confederation of Koreans led by Kim Svetlana, branch head of the United Confederation of Koreans in Uzbekistan, left here on Tuesday.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Japanese Society for the Study of the Juche Idea headed by Yukie Ikebe, co-representative of the Kansai Liaison Council for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, flew back home on Tuesday after visiting the DPRK to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Foreign Figure Skaters Leave
articles.content:
Foreign Figure Skaters Leave
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Players of Russia, Latvia, Belarus, Italy, the Czech Republic and Serbia flew back home on Tuesday after taking part in the 23rd Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il).

articles.title: Delegation of Int'l Kothongryon Visits Kim Il Sung's Birthplace
articles.content:
Delegation of Int'l Kothongryon Visits Kim Il Sung's Birthplace
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the International United Confederation of Koreans (International Kothongryon) led by Kim Svetlana, branch head of the United Confederation of Koreans in Uzbekistan, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They looked round historic relics with keen interest at the old home where the President was born and nurtured his lofty will of revolution, spending his childhood.
					
					 They had a picture taken in front of the old home.
					
					 The branch head said that tears come to her eyes when remembering the President.
					
					 He devoted his whole life to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people, she noted, adding:
					
					 The feats he performed for the country, people, era and history will be immortal.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, Okryu Children's Hospital, Munsu Water Park, etc.

articles.title: National Meeting Held to Mark 40th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Important Programme
articles.content:
National Meeting Held to Mark 40th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Important Programme 
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday to mark the 40th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's proclamation of the programme for modeling whole society on Kimilsungism.
					 On February 19, Juche 63 (1974) Kim Jong Il formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as an integral system of Juche-oriented idea, theory and method and proclaimed the modeling of whole society on Kimilsungism as the supreme programme of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The programme is Juche-oriented revolutionary one for advancing the Korean revolution by regarding Kimilsungism as the only guidelines and transforming man, society and nature as required by Kimilsungism to build society where the independence of the popular masses is fully realized.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Pak Pong Ju and other senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, media and other fields of party ideological work, persons of merit, working people in Pyongyang and the delegations of overseas Koreans.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), made a report.
					
					 The reporter said that the proclamation of the programme marked a historic event that provided an important programme to the revolutionary party in the era of independence and gave perfect answers to the issues on the strategy and tactics for implementing it and set a new milestone for the WPK and the Korean revolution.
					
					 By setting a clear target and laying down a blueprint for accomplishing the revolutionary cause Kim Jong Il put the Korean revolution on the watershed of history; a new turning point was brought about in all fields of party, state and armed forces building and economic and cultural construction and a heyday was ushered in the era of the Workers' Party.
					
					 The most shining victory has been won under the most difficult situation, the tradition of the Korean revolution given steady continuity to develop into the bloodline of Mt. Paektu and an eternal foundation laid for the future of the revolution since the proclamation of the programme, the reporter noted, and went on:
					
					 The Korean revolution has entered the historic stage of modeling whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in all spheres under the steersmanship of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un formulated the revolutionary idea of the WPK as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and proclaimed the modeling of whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the supreme programme of the party.
					
					 This means a revolutionary inheritance of the modeling of whole society on Kimilsungism and its development in depth on a new high stage.
					
					  By setting forth the programme for modeling whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Kim Jong Un provided a sure ideological and theoretical guarantee for eternally glorifying the undying exploits performed by Kim Jong Il in the course of the arduous revolution for decades and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and the revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					 The reporter called for winning a fresh shining victory in the revolutionary cause of Juche and the revolutionary cause of Songun by taking hold on great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the eternal banner of victory.
					
					 He underlined the need to conduct the work in all fields of revolution and construction as required by Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and thus build a thriving socialist nation of Juche on this land as early as possible, where the noble intentions and desires of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will come true and the people will enjoy the greatest wellbeing with nothing to desire more in the world.
					
					 He called for achieving the independent reunification of the country without fail under the unfurled banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and making positive efforts for global peace and security and independent development of humankind.

articles.title: Cuban Ambassador Hosts Reception to Mark Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Cuban Ambassador Hosts Reception to Mark Day of Shining Star
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception in his embassy on Feb. 18 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Yong Il, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), and officials concerned.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The Cuban ambassador said in a speech that Kim Jong Il further developed the friendly relations between the parties, governments and peoples of the two countries provided by Fidel Castro Ruz and President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The revolutionary cause pioneered by the peerlessly great men has been successfully carried forward by supreme leader Kim Jong Un, he noted.
					
					 Expressing belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger, he sincerely wished Kim Jong Un bigger successes in his responsible work for leading the Korean people to victory.
					
					 Kim Yong Il said in a speech that it is an expression of boundless reverence for Kim Jong Il that Cuban comrades significantly celebrate the Day of the Shining Star together with the people of the DPRK every year.
					
					 It is a valuable fruition of the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il with the strong will and pluck that the army and people of the DPRK have protected Korean style socialism centered on the popular masses despite the enemies' vicious moves to isolate and stifle it, he noted, adding:
					
					 The Korean people will as ever positively support the fraternal Cuban people in their struggle to smash the U.S. imperialists' blockade moves and protect the gains of socialism.

articles.title: Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan Gives Performance
articles.content:
Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan Gives Performance
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The art troupe of Koreans in Japan gave a performance "Unity in single mind through generations" at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre Monday to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier, Han Chol, vice-minister of Culture, officials concerned and working people and students in Pyongyang.
					
					 Among the audience were the delegation of Koreans in Japan and delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star, overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Through female trio "Our Father", "Our Comrade Kim Jong Il" and other numbers the performers sang high praises of Kim Jong Il, who showed warm loving care for officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and other Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The audience were deeply moved by male solo "I Will Never Sell My Mind" and trio dance "One" which reflect the firm resolve of Koreans in Japan to devotedly protect Chongryon, a precious legacy left by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, and  desire of Koreans for reunification.
					
					 Mixed chorus "Ongheya", female solo and dance "Moran Hill" and a series of other delightful folk songs, dances and instrumental music added to the atmosphere of the performance. 
					
					 The performance showed well the iron will of Koreans in Japan to hold in high esteem Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as eternal sun and keep to the road of patriotism under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: School Youth and Children of DPRK Enjoy Ski Camping
articles.content:
School Youth and Children of DPRK Enjoy Ski Camping
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- A ski camping for school youth and children of the DPRK is now under way at the Masikryong Ski Resort, built in a mountainous area as a splendid popular sports and tourist destination.
					 Among them are students of Kim Il Sung University and Pyongyang University of Architecture and pupils of Pyongyang Primary School No. 4. 
					
					 They were warmly greeted at the resort by employees of Masikryong Hotel on February 13. They walked round rooms of the hotel, ski service facilities and lodging buildings, all of them in good harmony with the nature.
					
					 Deeply moved by supreme leader Kim Jong Un's loving care for younger generation, they sang the song "Ardent Desire" in chorus full of gratefulness to him at the hotel.
					
					 Choe Yong Chol, a student of Kim Il Sung University, told KCNA that he felt as if he was attending an international ski game.
					
					 Kim Ryong Hyok, a student of the university, said he would do his best in learning skiing.
					
					 Ri Mun, a student of Pyongyang University of Architecture, said:
					
					 This is the first time for me to ski, but I soon realized skiing is very enjoyable.
					
					 With a pride of being a student at the university with Marshal Kim Jong Un as its honorary president, I will devote all my wisdom and enthusiasm to ushering in a heyday of construction in the country.

articles.title: Korean Stamps Museum
articles.content:
Korean Stamps Museum
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- On display at the Korean Stamps Museum are different kinds of stamps, envelopes and postcards, which give a glimpse of the country in different periods.
					 Among them are scores of stamps dating back to the period of the Feudal Joson Dynasty (1392-1910), including two kinds of Munwi stamps, which depict the then currency unit, issued in November 1884, various kinds of stamps designed by painter Ji Chang Han in January 1900-May 1901 and a stamp issued in commemoration of the 40th anniversary of Emperor Kojong's enthronement. 
					
					 Also on display is the stamp "Samsonam" issued in Juche 35 (1946), a year after the country's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule.
					
					 What catches visitors' eyes are the stamps showing the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk, as well as those showing the history of the DPRK.
					
					 Visitors can see stamps of diverse themes including the history, culture and traditional customs of the Korean people.
					
					 More than 5 800 kinds of stamps have been issued in the DPRK for nearly 70 years after the country's liberation.
					
					 The DPRK's stamps enjoy popularity in other countries, winning special prizes at international stamps exhibitions, including "Riccione 90" and "Riccione 91" held in Italy.
					
					 The museum, located by Pyongyang Koryo Hotel, was opened in April 2012.

articles.title: Guidelines for Establishing Juche in Ideological Work
articles.content:
Guidelines for Establishing Juche in Ideological Work
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung convened the 1st Conference of Ideological Officials of the Workers' Party of Korea on December 28, Juche 44 (1955), at which he made the historic speech "On Eliminating Dogmatism and Formalism and Establishing Juche in Ideological Work."
					 The President in the work clarified that establishing Juche in ideological work of the WPK means carrying out the Korean revolution successfully, and set forth in detail the ways to realize it.
					
					 The work underscored the need for the ideological officials to have a wealth of knowledge about the Korean history, geography and customs, exert special efforts to study the history of the Korean people's struggle and revolutionary traditions and impress them upon the working masses. 
					
					 It called on them to reject flunkeyism, make a deep study of their own things and, in particular, deeply grasp and thoroughly carry out the party's line and policies.
					
					 It explicitly expounded the correlation between patriotism and internationalism.
					
					 The work has served as important guidelines for strengthening the unity of the party and cohesion of the popular masses on the basis of the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung and advancing the revolution as required by the Juche idea.
					
					 After its publication, the party and working people's organizations have made big efforts to educate the people in the ideas of Kim Il Sung's works and the WPK's policies and encourage them to be well versed in the party's history and revolutionary traditions.
					
					 An ideological struggle was conducted throughout the party and society to eliminate all sorts of reactionary ideological tendencies like flunkeyism, dogmatism, revisionism and factionalism.
					
					 Through the struggle for establishing Juche in ideological work, the WPK has been further consolidated in organizational and ideological aspects with the main force of the Korean revolution reinforced.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lays Bare U.S. Dangerous Move to Frame Up Asian Version of NATO
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lays Bare U.S. Dangerous Move to Frame Up Asian Version of NATO
						
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- U.S. experts on international and military affairs are asserting that the U.S. should have a "leading position" in ensuring "peace" and "security" in the Asia-Pacific region as its situation remains very unstable and, to this end, it is necessary to work out a new strategy and carry it out, and it is most ideal to set up the Asian version of NATO.
					 The U.S. authorities, expressing their positive stand toward this, are talking about the justification of close military cooperation and alliance with their allies in the region. The U.S. is busying itself doing so.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun on Tuesday observes in an article in this regard:
					
					 What the U.S. seeks is to set up the Asian version of NATO and, on its basis, dominate the region.
					
					 In the past period the U.S. had made alliance with some forces following it in the Asia-Pacific region while laying stress on Europe only.
					
					 It considers that it cannot dominate the region, Northeast Asia in particular, through such alliance. So, it is trying to fake up an integral military bloc to contain big powers in the region. The core of the scenario is to round off the bilateral alliance between the U.S. and south Korea and between the U.S. and Japan as a triangular military alliance and develop it into a multinational military alliance comprising Australia, etc.
					
					 It is needless to say that the Asian version of NATO is an aggressive military bloc for realizing the U.S. Asia-Pacific strategy.
					
					 What matters is which is the primary target of attack of this Asian version of NATO. It is the DPRK. The U.S. calculates that only when it puts the Korean peninsula under its control, can it contain neighboring big powers with the peninsula as a springboard.
					
					 If a new aggressive military bloc is knocked into shape with the huge U.S. forces as an axis in the region, arms race, confrontation, military conflict and war in the region will be inevitable.

articles.title: Revolutionary Literature, Art Serve as Powerful Weapon: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Revolutionary Literature, Art Serve as Powerful Weapon: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The revolutionary literature and art serve as a powerful weapon that gives a strong impetus to the advancement of the era, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea has put the demand and interests of the people above all and comprehensively and fully met them regarding the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as its guidelines. Its wise leadership provides a sure guarantee for the Juche-oriented literature and art to successfully carry out the mission and duty as the genuine humanics.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, the DPRK's literature and art have achieved the proud development while promoting and leading the advance of the era and the people's struggle.
					
					 The tradition of the revolutionary literature and art created by President Kim Il Sung in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle was followed by the period of the development of the Juche-oriented art thanks to the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Il, the great master of creation.
					
					 It is necessary to fully prove with the Juche-oriented literature and art the greatness of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, who has turned the DPRK into a highly civilized and prosperous thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The ideological and spiritual core of the army and the people of the DPRK advancing while overcoming all hardships and trials is an absolute and ardent loyalty to Kim Jong Un and the might of the idea and faith is the most powerful motive force accelerating the DPRK's victorious advance.
					
					 Only when the DPRK makes the truthful artistic representation of these main feelings of the era and develop them into a positive spirit of the era, will it advance more dynamically and faster.

articles.title: Ships Collide in S. Korea
articles.content:
Ships Collide in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Ships collided with each other in the waters off Pusan, south Korea on Feb 15, according to south Korean KBS.
					 The accident destroyed oil tanks, causing a huge oil leak in waters.

articles.title: Kimjongilia, Korean Book and Photo Exhibition Held in China
articles.content:
Kimjongilia, Korean Book and Photo Exhibition Held in China
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- There took place a Kimjongilia, Korean book and photo exhibition in Shenyang, China on Feb. 12 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display there were photos documenting revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were celebrated works of the peerlessly great men and books and photos showing the true picture of Songun Korea.
					
					 The exhibition was decorated with more than 300 potted Kimjongilia flowers brought into full bloom in reflection of deep reverence of the Chinese people for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Present there were personages of various circles and masses in Liaoning Province, China.
					
					 Invited to the event were officials of the DPRK Consulate General in Shenyang and various units working there.
					
					 Visitors praised Kimjongilia as an immortal flower which came into being in reflection of the profound reverence and praise of the Korean people and progressive mankind for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The exhibition will offer an opportunity for demonstrating the true picture of the prosperous DPRK and further deepening the bonds of the Sino-DPRK friendship, they noted.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- There took place round-table talks in Ethiopia and film shows in DR Congo and Nigeria on Feb. 6 and 7 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Films shown included Korean film "Pyongyang Today".
					
					 The chief of the Irrigation Project of Design and Supervision Enterprise in Oromia Province, Ethiopia said:
					
					 By pursuing the original Songun politics, Kim Jong Il led the DPRK to advance along the road of Juche, demonstrating its might before the world despite the moves of the imperialists to stifle it.
					
					 I wish the Korean people steady and brilliant successes in their efforts to protect the sovereignty of the country and build a thriving nation under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully inheriting the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The director of La Prosperite, a paper of DR Congo, said:
					
					 After watching the film I came to know well about socialist Korea which has achieved great development in all fields including politics, military affairs and economy, and about the might of the single-minded unity stronger than nukes.
					
					 The eye-opening development of the DPRK evoking admiration and praise of the world people is unthinkable without the exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, who made the forced march for the people till the last moments of his life, will always be remembered by mankind.
					
					 The department director of the Ministry of Labor in Yobe State of Nigeria said: Kim Jong Il dedicated his whole life to the happiness of the people. It was his maxim to believe in the people as in Heaven. His politics based on love for the people has been brilliantly carried forward by Kim Jong Un. Rosy is the future of the DPRK led by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Lauded by Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Lauded by Overseas Koreans
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Overseas Koreans were excited to visit the venue of the 18th Kimjongilia Festival.
					 Ri Yong Ho, managing director of the Dandong Shengmin Trading Co. Ltd., China, said: 
					
					 I take pride in attending this festival.
					
					 Kimjongilia flowers displayed in the venue are associated with our minds longing for the peerlessly great man.
					
					 Kimjongilia is, indeed, the most famous flower which looks fascinating and beautiful.
					
					 The flower represents the personality of leader Kim Jong Il as a great man. The sea of flowers praising the great man is a manifestation of the ardent longing and reverence of all people for him.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is always alive in our mind.
					
					 We, overseas compatriots, will make positive contribution to the patriotic cause for national prosperity, keeping pace with the people in the homeland.
					
					 Choe Ryong Ho, vice-president of Yanbian University of Science and Technology of China, said in an excited tone:
					
					 We are taking part in the festival to keep the greatness of Kim Jong Il deep in our mind.
					
					 We don't think Kimjongilia is a flower coming out in nature. It reflects deep reverence of all the people in the homeland and overseas Koreans for the great man.
					
					 Nam Ju Hyon, member of the delegation of Koreans in Japan for celebration of the Day of the Shining Star, said:
					
					 The Kimjongilia Festival has become more distinctive and wonderful year by year.
					
					 My heart is full of emotions when I see flowers displayed by the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					
					 Everyone can understand the ardent mind of the Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan to always hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem.
					
					 Jon To Hyon, member of the same delegation, said:
					
					 Every Kimjongilia flower cultivated with all sincerity and much care is associated with the ardent reverence of the nation for the peerlessly great man.
					
					 Going round the venue of the festival, I could know well about the will of the people in the homeland and overseas Koreans to eternally hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the sun of the nation.
					
					 Kimjongilia, flower of the sun, will bloom forever in the mind of Koreans as flower praising the great man.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Observed by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Observed by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of various countries carried special write-ups to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The February issue of the German paper Rote Fahne carried an article illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il, which said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il, eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people and progressive humankind.
					
					 He left nothing for himself but made ceaseless tours of field guidance in simple jumper all his life.
					
					 He made sure that monuments and statues were erected for the people who made great contributions to the country and people but didn't allow the erection of his statue.
					
					 The Korean people are leading a happy life in a great family, holding him in high esteem as their father.
					
					 A Russian personage praised Kim Jong Il, who always thought of the homeland and people even during his foreign tours, as a leader who worked heart and soul only for the happiness of people.
					
					 Thanks to his tireless devotion, socialism in the DPRK has been firmly protected and the Korean people could work miracles and innovations in the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 The Indonesian paper Republica on Feb. 11 in an article titled "Man who believed in people as in Heaven" said Kim Jong Il set it as the most important affair and supreme goal to improve the people's standard of living and provided ceaseless field guidance to materialize the ideal of the people.
					
					 A Hungarian paper on Feb. 13 in an article titled "Kim Jong Il, destiny of the DPRK and socialism" praised his undying Songun leadership exploits for the country and revolution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter Posted on Website of Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Letter Posted on Website of Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's letter "Let Us Bring About Innovations in Agricultural Production under the Unfurled Banner of the Socialist Rural Theses", which he sent to the participants in the National Conference of Subworkteam Leaders in the Agricultural Sector, was posted on the website of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on Feb. 10.
					 The letter, sent to the participants on Feb. 6, Juche 103 (2014), refers to the great changes effected in the socialist rural construction of the country after the publication of the Socialist Rural Theses on Feb. 25, 1964 and indicates the tasks and ways to finally solve the rural issue.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed by Guinean, Mexican Organizations
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed by Guinean, Mexican Organizations
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Guinea and Mexico released bulletins to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of Shining Star).
					 The Guinean Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association in an article titled "Kimjongilia" on Feb. 6 gave detailed accounts of the immortal flower.
					
					 Referring to the history of Kimjongilia and the fact that it was awarded top prix in international flower exhibitions, the article noted:
					
					 Now the immortal flower has been rapidly propagated in many countries.
					
					 Kimjongilia has drawn attraction from all peoples, getting the entire globe dyed red. This is not simply because of its special beauty.
					
					 This is just an expression of deep reverence of humankind for Kim Jong Il. Kimjongilia will bring into fuller bloom on the planet, enjoying love and attraction of mankind along with the august name of the peerlessly great man.
					
					 On the same day the Mexican Institute of the Juche Idea in an article titled "Comrade Kim Jong Il and the great Juche idea" highly praised his ideological and theoretical exploits.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Congo
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" was brought out in booklet by the Akram Publishing House in Brazzaville of Congo on Feb. 7.
					 The work, published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and the noble patriotic life of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also indicates important issues arising in embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Glorify the Great Achievements of the Respected Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was brought out in booklet by the Razo Publishing House in Artyom City, Russia on Feb. 10.
					 The work, published on April 17, Juche 81 (1992), deals with the greatness of President Kim Il Sung and indicates the tasks to hold him in high esteem for all ages.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia juegos deportivos de militares de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia juegos deportivos de militares de EPC
Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ACNC) -- En ocasion del Dia de la Estrella Luz (16 de febrero, dia del nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il) tuvo lugar la competencia de deporte entre los militares de las comandancias de las fuerzas navales y de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas, del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del EPC, la presencio junto con Ri Sol Ju.
					
					Los militares de la comandancia de las fuerzas navales participaron como el equipo Galmaegi (Gaviota) y los de la comandancia de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas, como el equipo Jebi (Golondrina).
					
					La competencia se realizo en dos disciplinas: el voleibol y la lucha de la cuerda.
					
					En los partidos el equipo Jebi salio triunfante.
					
					Hubo la premiacion al equipo ganador.
					
					El Mariscal dijo que en ocasion del significante Dia de la Estrella Luz tuvo lugar en alto nivel la competencia deportiva de los militares de las comandancias de las fuerzas navales y de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC y expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que tambien en el futuro el EPC estara al frente en la labor para avivar en todo el pais una oleada deportiva. 
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, So Hong Chan, Kim Myong Sik, Ri Pyong Chol y otros comandantes, oficiales y soldados del EPC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito dedicada al 16 de febrero
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito dedicada al 16 de febrero
Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 72o aniversario del natalicio del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il, tuvo lugar en el Teatro del Pueblo la funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito por el Dia de la Estrella Luz.
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, disfruto el espectaculo con Ri Sol Ju.
					
					El felicito calidamente a los espectadores que acogen el Dia de la Estrella Luz.
					
					En la funcion, dividida en la primera y segunda partes, se presentaron las piezas de diferentes generos, entre otras, los coros masculinos "Kim Jong Il siempre esta vivo como el Sol" y "El General corre a caballo blanco", el trio de instrumentos musicales "Orgullo de nuestro Partido", la musica orquestal "Encanto y veneracion" y el coro masculino "Los soldados en marcha".
					
					Los ejecutantes encomiaron las proezas imperecederas del Dirigente quien en toda su vida, trabajo con abnegacion por la patria y el pueblo.
					
					Se interpretaron igualmente el coro masculino "En el bosque cercano al frente", la musica orquestal "Musicas famosas del mundo" y otras musicas extranjeras.
					
					Kim Jong Un felicito el exito de la funcion y expuso la esperanza y conviccion de que los creadores y artistas del Coro llamaran a los militares y habitantes coreanos a la magna lucha por comenzar la era de prosperidad de la Corea del Songun.
					
					Vieron la funcion Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Pyon In Son, So Hong Chan y otros comandantes del EPC y los oficiales y soldados del EPC.

articles.title: Premier coreano averigua estado de reconstruccion de villa deportiva del reparto Chongchun
articles.content:
Premier coreano averigua estado de reconstruccion de villa deportiva del reparto Chongchun
Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, se cercioro en el terreno del estado de reconstruccion y reparacion de la villa deportiva del capitalino Reparto Chongchun.
					Los constructores participantes en la obra modernizaron los centros deportivos con las fuerzas unidas entre el ejercito y el pueblo.
					
					El premier estuvo en las salas de presentacion de historial, las de ejercicios y espera de jugadores y los salones de prensa de los centros de baloncesto, voleibol y natacion averiguando los detalles de remodelacion.
					
					Tuvo lugar la reunion consultiva de los funcionarios de las ramas correspondientes.
					
					En la ocasion, Pak resalto la necesidad de administrar bien los centros deportivos en el tiempo actual en que se aspira a la potencia deportiva, diciendo que el deporte surte grandes efectos en aumentar el orgullo y la dignidad nacional.
					
					Por otra parte, el discutio y tomo las medidas para resolver los problemas que se presentan en la reconstruccion del Estadio Primero de Mayo.
					
					Con anterioridad, visito el Complejo Carbonifero de la Zona de Anju para averiguar el estado de produccion.

articles.title: Acto central por el 19 de febrero
articles.content:
Acto central por el 19 de febrero
Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugares dia 18 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 40o aniversario de la promulgacion del programa de transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					El 19 de febrero del 63 (1974) de la Era Juche, el Dirigente formulo la idea revolucionaria del Presidente Kim Il Sung como sistema integral de la idea, la teoria y el metodo del Juche y promulgo la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo como maximo programa del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Dicho programa es el revolucionario del Juche que posibilita llevar adelante la revolucion coreana tomando el kimilsungismo como unica guia directriz y construir una sociedad en que se haya realzado completamente la independencia de las masas populares transformando a los seres humanos, la sociedad y la naturaleza segun el requisito del kimilsungismo.
					
					En el acto estuvieron presentes Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, funcionarios de las ramas de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, prensa e informacion y la labor ideologica del partido, ameritados, trabajadores capitalinos y las delegaciones de compatriotas en ultramar.
					
					La palabra de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del PTC.
					
					El informante senalo que la promulgacion del programa de la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo fue un acontecimiento historico que dio respuestas perfectas al programa de lucha del partido revolucionario de la epoca de la independencia y al problema sobre las estrategias y tacticas para su realizacion y establecio un nuevo jalon en el camino a seguir por el PTC y la revolucion, y prosiguio:
					
					Gracias a que el Dirigente dilucido las metas claras y la perspectiva para completar la causa revolucionaria, la revolucion coreana pudo registrar nuevos cambios en todas las esferas de la construccion del partido, el estado, las fuerzas armadas, la economia y la cultura y se situo en la cimera de la historia en que se abre la era de prosperidad de la epoca del partido del trabajo.
					
					Desde el dia de la proclamacion del programa hasta hoy, se ha logrado la mas brillante victoria aun en las condiciones mas dificiles, se ha heredado la arteria vital de la revolucion coreana como linaje del monte Paektu y se ha preparado el cimiento eterno para el futuro de la revolucion.
					
					Bajo la orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, la revolucion coreana ha entrado en una etapa historica en que se realiza integralmente la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo. 
					
					El Mariscal formulo la idea revolucionaria del PTC como kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo y  declaro la trasformacion de toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo como maximo programa del partido.
					
					La dicha doctrina es la sucesion revolucionaria de la trasformacion de toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo y la profundizacion y el desarrollo a una nueva alta etapa.
					
					Gracias a ello, se ha preparado la firme garantia ideo-teorica para defender para siempre las hazanas inmortales logradas por el Dirigente en la trayectoria de la revolucion ardua de varios decenios y llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria de Juche, la del Songun.
					
					Hay que lograr la nueva victoria brillante de la causa revolucionaria de Juche, la del Songun tomando el gran kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo como bandera de victoria eterna.
					
					Deben impulsar segun la demanda del kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo las labores de todas las ramas de la revolucion y construccion y construir cuanto antes el Estado prospero socialista de Juche en que se materialicen el noble proposito y deseo del Presidente y el Dirigente y el pueblo goce de una vida feliz sin envidiar nada en el mundo.
					
					Hay que alcanzar sin falta la reunificacion independiente de la patria enarbolando la bandera del gran kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo y luchar con dinamismo por lograr la paz y la seguridad del mundo y el desarrollo independiente de la humanidad.
